name: Wiredcraft
tag_list: open-source, web, mobile, nginx, puppet, node-js, sphinx, drupal, china, shanghai
description: Web and mobile solutions on Open Source
overview:
We build Web and mobile solutions using Open Source technologies. We solve real world problems; scaling sites to millions of users, building APIs for mobile applications, helping organizations visualize large sets of data.

We are problem solvers before anything else and have done so successfully in several fields; performance, UI and UX, multilingual & mobile solutions, third party APIs… We love being challenged and try to find the best tools to do the job. We have done a fair amount of work with Drupal but our team has built expertise in a pretty wide range of technologies; NGINX, Python, jQuery, Solr, Sphinx, Puppet, Android, node.js and much more…

Our clients stretch across a wide range of industries; CNN, the United Nations, IFES, PopCap Games, Nvidia, NGOs as well as US government agencies.
